name: boltble-sdk
summary: BoltBle SDK  handle basic bluetooth activity of bolt-charger like start , end , cosumed energy
description:
The BoltBleSdk is product of BoltEarth which allow connection with bolt chargers and bluetooth device(iOS), BoltBleSdk support below features
StartCharging , PauseCharging , EndCharging, Consumed energy by connected device with charger while charging.
